hero.badge: New: Launch your project in 14 days
hero.title: Custom web solutions to digitize your services
hero.subtitle: Personalized websites, professional design, visible and profitable, that generate real results for your business — more traffic, more clients, more impact.

services.title: Services
services.subtitle: Accessible and tailored web solutions for your business

web_creation.title: Custom Website Creation
web_creation.subtitle: Website Creation – From A to Z
web_creation.description: Transform your vision into digital reality with our full expertise in web development. We create modern, fast, and Google-optimized websites. From UX/UI design to launch, every project is custom-built with the latest technologies (React, Next.js, WordPress). Get a professional site that converts visitors into clients and boosts your revenue from the first month.

web_redesign.title: Website Redesign
web_redesign.description: Is your current website not generating enough sales? Our redesign service turns your online presence into a conversion machine. We analyze your conversion rate, optimize user experience, and modernize the design to double your results. Mobile-first interface, optimized loading speed, smooth user journey – everything is designed to maximize your revenue and reduce bounce rate by 40%.

seo_optimization.title: SEO & Visibility Optimization
seo_optimization.description: Dominate Google's first page and multiply your organic traffic by 5 in 6 months. Our complete SEO strategy includes: in-depth technical audit, on-page optimization, optimized content creation, quality link building, and performance tracking. We target profitable keywords in your sector to attract qualified prospects.

maintenance.title: Maintenance & Technical Support
maintenance.description: Protect your digital investment with our premium maintenance service. Enhanced security, automatic backups, regular updates, 24/7 monitoring, and priority support. We guarantee 99.9% uptime and response time under 2h. Avoid costly outages and focus on your business while we keep your site in perfect working order.

cta_banner.background: Let's turn your ideas into digital reality together
cta_banner.description: We support your digital growth with innovative and tailored solutions. Contact us for a free consultation and discover how we can boost your online presence.

what_we_do.question: What services do you offer?
what_we_do.answer: We offer comprehensive digital solutions including web development, mobile app development, digital marketing, and technology consulting.

timeline.question: How long does a typical project take?
timeline.answer: Project timelines vary depending on scope and complexity. A simple website typically takes 4-6 weeks, while complex applications may take 3-6 months. We also offer a rapid 14-day development option.

pricing_model.question: How do you structure your pricing?
pricing_model.answer: We offer flexible pricing models including fixed-price projects, hourly rates, and retainer agreements based on your specific needs.

support_included.question: Is ongoing support included?
support_included.answer: Yes, we provide ongoing support and maintenance packages to ensure your digital solutions continue to perform optimally.

technologies.question: What technologies do you use?
technologies.answer: We use modern technologies including React, Next.js, Node.js, and cloud platforms like Vercel.

consultation.question: Do you offer free consultations?
consultation.answer: Yes, we offer a free initial consultation to discuss your project requirements and provide strategic recommendations.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: Ready to Start Your Project?
contact.description: Contact us today to discuss your project and see how we can help you achieve your digital goals.
contact.socialDesc: Follow us on social media for the latest updates, insights, and behind-the-scenes content.
